video.title: Kotoura-san
video.synopsis: Bullied by her classmates, a teenage psychic moves to a new school, where she makes friends and joins a club dedicated to ESP research.

episodes.synopsis: New student Haruka has a secret to share with her dim-witted school chum Yoshihisa -- after she uses her special talent to save his life.
episodes.title: Kotoura-san and Manabe-kun

episodes.synopsis: Haruka forms a bond with a club of like-minded classmates, including Yuriko, whose life mission is to prove the existence of clairvoyant powers.
episodes.title: The First…

episodes.synopsis: Jealous of Haruka, classmate Hiyori plays a dumb prank that puts her friendship with Yoshihisa -- and his life -- in peril.
episodes.title: So Happy, So Fun

episodes.synopsis: After Haruka runs away, her classmates track her down at Grandpa Zenzou's house, and Yoshihisa's mind reveals his true feelings about Haruka.
episodes.title: Changing World

episodes.synopsis: Hiyori joins the ESP Research Club and Yuriko decides it's time for a welcome party; meanwhile, an upcoming sports festival has Haruka stressing.
episodes.title: School Paradise?

episodes.synopsis: The club is excited to take a relaxing vacation at Haruka's grandfather's house -- but when they arrive, a spooky summer surprise is waiting for them.
episodes.title: Summer Vacation!

episodes.synopsis: Yoshihisa hasn't been around much, and Haruka wonders what he's hiding. She and Yuriko decide to spy on him and discover he has a part-time job.
episodes.title: In This World, I…

episodes.synopsis: Haruka gets a winter cold with a very strange side effect: She has trouble reading minds, including Yoshihisa's perverted thoughts about her.
episodes.title: It's Not a Date

episodes.synopsis: Haruka's ESP reveals details of a crime, but she doesn't think the police will believe her; meanwhile, a rumor spreads that she's hiding information.
episodes.title: Everyone is Around Me

episodes.synopsis: When the police suspect Hiyori is behind a series of attacks, Haruka decides it's time to use her mind-reading powers to catch the real criminal.
episodes.title: But You're Not Here

episodes.synopsis: Worried about an attacker on the loose, Haruka spends time with officer Tsukino -- but the bumbling detective is hiding a dangerous secret.
episodes.title: Stand By Me

episodes.synopsis: The ESP Research Club is reformed, Yoshihisa and Haruka have a talk about feelings, and Haruka's mother returns to reveal long-buried emotions.
episodes.title: The Things I Want to Tell You
